parameters.name: allotmentIdentifier
parameters.description: Allotment Identifier of the Allotment to retrieve.

parameters.name: flightDate
parameters.description: Flight Date of the Allotment to retrieve.

404.description: Allotment with given Allotment Identifier and FlightDate could not be found

parameters.name: awbNumber
parameters.description: AirWaybill Number of the booking to track.

post.summary: Get the details of a quote via mail

allotmentIdentifier.description:
Assigned allotment identifier by  package Management System.
This number is needed in the allotment booking operation.

allotmentType.description: Indicates the type of allotment, used to know if it is a soft allocation or hard allocation allotment.

flightNumber.description: Flight Number, constructed using the carrier code + flight number.

airportOfOrigin.description: This allotment has been agreed for package originating from this particular airport (IATA code).

airportOfOnload.description: IATA Airport code where the package is loaded on a  flight.

airportOfOffload.description: IATA Airport code where the package is loaded off from a  flight.

airportOfDestination.description: IATA Airport code where the package is intended to be finally delivered from  standpoint.

released.description: Indicates whether this allotment has been released or not.

localLatestAcceptanceTime.description: Latest Local DateTime on which the the package has to be accepted at the departing airport.

utcLatestAcceptanceTime.description: Latest UTC DateTime on which the the package has to be accepted at the departing airport.

rates.description: List of applicable rate information for the allotment.

routes.description: List of applicable route information for the allotment.

iataNumber.description: Identifier of the party in the International Air Transport Association.

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

bookingContactEmail.description: Optional contact email of the person in charge of this booking.

allotmentIdentifier.description: Assigned allotment identifier by package Management System.

flightNumber.description: The flight identifier consisting of the carrier code and the flight number.

latestAcceptanceTime.description: Latest Acceptance time of this booking.

airportOfOrigin.description: Origin airport or station (IATA code) of the shipment.

airportOfDestination.description: Destination airport or station (IATA code) of the shipment.

totalNumberOfPieces.description: Amount of pieces in the shipment.

totalVolume.description: Total volume of the shipment in cubic meters.

totalWeight.description: Total weight of the shipment in kilograms.

dimensions.description: List of detailed dimensions included in the (loose) shipment.

ulds.description: List of details on the (containerized) shipment.

iataNumber.description: Identifier of the party in the International Air Transport Association.

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

bookingContactEmail.description: Optional contact email of the person in charge of this booking.

allotmentIdentifier.description:
Assigned allotment identifier by  package Management System.
AllotmentIdentifier is mandatory along with the flightNumber and flightDate.

flightNumber.description:
The flight identifier consisting of the carrier code and the flight number.
Mandatory along with allotmentIdentifier and flightDate.

flightDate.description:
The scheduled departure date.
Mandatory along with the allotmentIdentifier and flightNumber.

airportOfOrigin.description: Origin airport or station (IATA code) of the shipment.

airportOfDestination.description: Destination airport or station (IATA code) of the shipment.

stackable.description:
Indicates whether the goods are stackable or not.
If the goods are non-stackable, ALL pieces have to be included in dimensions.
Must be false for ULD shipments.
Default true

totalNumberOfPieces.description: Amount of pieces in the shipment.

totalVolume.description: Total volume of the shipment in cubic meters.

totalWeight.description: Total weight of the shipment in kilograms.

dimensions.description: List of detailed dimensions included in the (loose) shipment.

ulds.description: List of details on the (containerized) shipment.

allotmentIdentifier.description: Assigned allotment identifier by  package Management System on which the booking was created.

totalChargeableWeight.description: The total chargeable weight of the booking in kilograms.

warnings.description: List of warnings related to the booking.

errors.description: List of errors related to the booking.

Models.Allocations.AllotmentBookingRespo.description: Status of an allotmentBooking, a model for catching errors and warnings.

pieces.description: Number of pieces having these dimensions.

unit.description: Unit of length used for this dimension.

actualWeightPerPiece.description: Weight of the shipment piece(s) in kg.

height.description: Height of the shipment piece(s) in the specified unit (CM or IN).

length.description: Length of the shipment piece(s) in the specified unit (CM or IN).

width.description: Width of the shipment piece(s) in the specified unit (CM or IN).

stackablePieces.description:
Indicates if these pieces are stackable.
Optional: default true.

currencyCode.description: ISO Currency Code; Coded representation of a currency approved by ISO.

weightUnit.description: Code identifying the unit of weight used.

allIn.description: Indicates if all surcharges are included or not.

ratingBasis.description: Indicates how the rates are based (bulk/pivot).

applicableNatureOfGoods.description: List of nature of goods to which this rate applies.

specialHandlingCodes.description: List of special handling codes related to the rate.

minimumCharge.description: The minimum charge that will apply.

normalRatePerWgtUnit.description: The normal rate that will apply per specified weight unit.

weightBreaks.description: List of weightbreaks. These are the weight ranges on which a particular unit price applies.

Models.Allocations.BulkRateDetail.description: The bulk rate detail for the rate definition.

Models.Allocations.Capacity.description: Capacity values for the allotment. (Original, current, booked, available)

allotmentNumber.description: Requested AllotmentNumber to list bookings of.

warnings.description: List of warnings related to the request.

errors.description: List of errors related to the request.

iataNumber.description: Identifier of the party in the International Air Transport Association.

flightNumber.description: The flight identifier consisting of the carrier code and the flight number.

flightDateFrom.description: Any valid flight date format yyyy-MM-dd.

flightDateTo.description: Can be null or any valid flight date format yyyy-MM-dd. Default value is (flightDateFrom + 14d) if not provided.

airportOfOnload.description: IATA station code where package is onloaded.

airportOfOffload.description: IATA station code where package is offloaded.

allotmentType.description: The indication whether the allotment is based on Soft allocation agreement or on a hard allocation agreement.

includeRoutes.description:
(Optional) Flag on whether routes linked to the allotments should be included in the response.
Default false.

includeRates.description:
(Optional) Flag on whether rates linked to the allotments should be included in the response.
Default false.

pivotWeight.description: Weight at which surcharges may be applied.

overPivotRatePerWgtUnit.description: Rate per weight unit when pivot weight has been exceeded.

localScheduledDepartureDateAndTime.description: Local scheduled Departure datetime of a (truck) flight.

localScheduledArrivalDateAndTime.description: Local scheduled Arrival datetime of a (truck) flight.

utcScheduledDepartureDateAndTime.description: UTC scheduled Departure datetime of a (truck) flight.

utcScheduledArrivalDateAndTime.description: UTC scheduled Arrival datetime of a (truck) flight.

onload.description: Onload of the route (IATA station code).

offload.description: Offload of the route (IATA station code).

weightBreak.description: Weight up until which the given rate per weight unit applies.

ratePerWgtUnit.description: Rate that applies per weight unit.

iataNumber.description: IATA number (identifier) of the office requesting the cancellation.

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

contactEmails.description: List of emails that will be contacted in regards to updates of the cancellation request.

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

warnings.description: List of warnings with code and description

errors.description: List of errors with code and description

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

carrier.description: Carrier code of the current flight number.

currentStatus.description: Most recent message received for the shipment.

currentStatusDescription.description: High level description with piece count.

currentStatusFlight.description: Flight number when current milestone is flight related.

currentStatusHighlighted.description: When current milestone is not flight related this is true. Otherwise the value is false.

currentStatusStation.description: Station Code with station name of the current station.

currentStatusStationCode.description: Station Code of the current station.

currentStatusTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for the current milestone.

currentStatusTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for the current milestone.

currentPlannedEventTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for the PET of this milestone event.

currentPlannedEventTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for the PET of this milestone event.

currentActualEventTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for the AET of this milestone event.

currentActualEventTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for the AET of this milestone event.

currentMessageReceivedTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for message received time of this milestone event.

currentMessageReceivedTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for message recvd time of this milestone event.

currentMilestoneType.description:
Milestone type assigned to current milestone.
"O"=origin
"D"=destination
"TI"=transit intermediate
"TO"=transit origin

currentPcs.description: Pieces assigned to the current milestone event.

currentCarrier.description: Carrier code of the current flight number.

currentFlt.description: Flight number of the current flight number.

delivered.description: True when delivered, otherwise the value is false.

deliveredTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for the event time of the DLV message.

deliveredTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for the event time of the DLV message.

nfdPlannedTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for the PET of the NFD message.

nfdPlannedTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for the PET of the NFD message.

destination.description: Station Code with Station Name of the destination station.

origin.description: Station Code with Station Name of the origin station.

originStation.description: Station Code of the origin station.

destinationStation.description: Station Code of the destination station.

bookedPieces.description: The number of pieces for the shipment.

stationMilestonesMap.description: Contains data structure for each Station in this shipment.

weightCode.description: The unit of measurement of weight.

complete.description: True when the segment data for the shipment is complete.

flightNumber.description: Flight number associated with flight segment.

isPlanned.description: Value is true when milestone message is not yet processed. Value is false when milestone message is processed.

milestoneIndex.description: Index of milestone in relative order.

milestoneLatestDate.description: AET in UTC when available, otherwise PET in UTC.

plannedEventTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for the PET of this milestone event.

plannedEventTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for the PET of this milestone event.

actualEventTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for the AET of this milestone event.

actualEventTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for the AET of this milestone event.

messageReceivedTimeLocal.description: Timestamp value on local station for message received time of this milestone event.

messageReceivedTimeUtc.description: Timestamp value on UTC timezone for message recvd time of this milestone event.

milestoneType.description:
Milestone type assigned to current milestone.
"O"=origin
"D"=destination
"TI"=transit intermediate
"TO"=transit origin

actualPiecesMilestone.description: Pieces assigned to the current milestone event.

carrier.description: Carrier code of the current flight number.

flt.description: Flight number of the current flight number.

awbNumbers.description: List of AwbNumbers that ought to be tracked.

NOT_FOUND.description: List of AwbNumbers that were not found (if any).

cmsAccountIdentifier.description: Identifier of the customer office in the CMS system.

iataNumber.description: IATA number of the customer office.

BookingOffice.description: Booking Office assigned to the customer office.

currency.description: Currency used by the customer office.

maxWeightPerPieceInKilogram.description: Set limit on the maximum weight per piece (in kg) for this customerOffice.

maxWeightPerRequestInKilogram.description: Set limit on the maximum weight per request (in kg) for this customerOffice.

maxWeightWithoutDimensionsInKilogram.description: Set limit on the maximum weight per request (in kg) in case no dimensions are provided. If 0, dimensions are always required.

maxVolumeWithoutDimensionsInM3.description: Set limit on the maximum volume per request (in m3) in case no dimensions are provided. If 0, dimensions are always required.

maxLengthInCm.description:
Maximum length of a piece (in cm) a dimensions may have for this customerOffice.
Interchangable with maxWidthInCm.

maxHeightInCm.description: Maximum height of a piece (in cm) a dimensions may have for this customerOffice.

maxWidthInCm.description:
Maximum width of a piece (in cm) a dimensions may have for this customerOffice.
Interchangable with maxLengthInCm.

allowedAirportsOfOrigin.description: List of origin airports (IATA-code) from where this customer may request quotes.

CustomerOffices.description: List of CustomerOffices linked to this customer.

allowedAllotmentContracts.description:
Optional whitelist restriction of allotment contracts the customer may book on.
If empty, restriction does not apply.

quantity.description: Amount of the specified ULD container.

weight.description: Weight per ULD container in kilograms.

iataNumber.description: IATA number of the office confirming the quote.

quoteId.description: The identifier of the quote to confirm.

quoteOptionId.description: Identifier of the option within the quote to confirm.

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

contactEmails.description: List of email addresses that may be used for confirmation.

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

quoteOptionId.description: Technical identifier of the quote option.

iataNumber.description: Identifier of the party in the International Air Transport Association.

status.description: Filter on the status of the requested quotes.

airportOfOrigin.description: Optional filter on the origin of the available quotes. 3 digit airport IATA code.

airportOfDestination.description: Optional filter on the destination of the available quotes. 3 digit airport IATA code.

quoteCreationDateTimeFrom.description: Earliest DateTime the quotes were created. ISO8601 Format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z').

quoteCreationDateTimeTo.description: Latest possible DateTime when the quotes were created. ISO8601 Format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z').

awbNumber.description: AirwayBill Number to optionally filter on

contactEmail.description: Contact email to optionally filter on

includeQuoteOptions.description: Flag to return all options within a quote (default false).

iataChargeCode.description: IATA Qualifier code of the surcharge.

chargeAmountPerKg.description: Amount charged per KG in the surcharge.

chargeMinimumAmount.description: Minimum amount charged in the surcharge.

iataNumber.description: Identifier of the party in the International Air Transport Association.

airportOfOrigin.description: Airport or City code, origin of the quote. 3 digit IATA code.

airportOfDestination.description: Airport or City code, destination of the quote. 3 digit IATA code.

BookingOffice.description: IATA Code of the  booking office.

stackable.description: Indicates whether the goods in the quote are stackable or not.

contactEmails.description: List of contact email addresses that are linked to this quote.

totalActualWeight.description: The total actual weight of the shipment.

totalChargeableWeight.description: The total chargeable weight of the shipment.

totalVolume.description: The total volume of the shipment.

totalNumberOfPieces.description: The amount of pieces in the shipment.

sph.description: Special handling codes of the shipment.

dimensions.description: List of dimensions of the loose shipment.

ulds.description: List of details of the containerized (ULD) shipment.

awbNumber.description: Airwaybill prefix + "-" + number. Expected format is 3 + (1) + 8 digits. Must be mod(7).

bookingCreationDateTime.description: DateTime indicating when the quote was confirmed, and the booking was created.

quoteCreationDateTime.description: DateTime indicating when the quote was created.

termsAndConditionsDocument.description: Link to a document stating the terms and conditions associated with this quote.

quoteOptions.description: List of options for the quote.

pieces.description: Number of pieces having these dimensions.

unit.description: Unit of length used for this dimension.

actualWeightPerPiece.description: Weight of the shipment piece(s) in kg.

height.description: Height of the shipment piece(s) in the specified unit (CM or IN).

length.description: Length of the shipment piece(s) in the specified unit (CM or IN).

width.description: Width of the shipment piece(s) in the specified unit (CM or IN).

stackablePieces.description:
Indicates if these pieces are stackable.
Optional: default true.

Models.Dto.Quotes.QuoteDimensionElement.description: RequestQuoteDimensionElement is based on the generic DimensionElement.

quoteOptionId.description: Technical identifier of the quote option.

localLatestAcceptanceTime.description:
Latest local DateTime that the package has to be delivered at the origin.
Timezone corresponds to the first route in this option.

utcLatestAcceptanceTime.description: Latest DateTime (UTC) that the package has to be delivered at the origin.

bookingCreated.description: Indicates whether the quote option has been confirmed and the booking has been created.

flight.description: The flight identifier consisting of the carrier code, the flight number and operation date(DD/MON)

routingAndTiming.description: Information on the route taken in this quote option, including estimated times.

serviceLevel.description: Service level of the quote option.

Product.description: Product identification code of the quote option.

currency.description: ISO Currency code of the quote option.

allIn.description: Indicates if all surcharges are included in the quote option or not.

ratePerKg.description: Weight charges per kg of the quote option.

otherApplicableCharges.description: List of other applicable charges in the quote option.

routes.description: List of routes taken in the quote option.

iataNumber.description: Identifier of the party in the International Air Transport Association.

airportOfOrigin.description: Origin airport (IATA code) for the requested Quote.

airportOfDestination.description: Destination airport (IATA code) for the requested Quote.

earliestDepartureDate.description: Earliest possible date of departure (format 'yyyy-MM-dd') for the requested Quote.

latestArrivalDate.description:
Latest date of arrival (format 'yyyy-MM-dd') for the requested Quote. Will default to the (earliestDepartureDate + 14 days) if not provided.
Cannot be set later than 3 weeks compared to the earliestDepartureDate.

flightNumbers.description: List of flight numbers to scope the requested quote to.

stackable.description:
Indicates whether the goods for the requested quote are stackable or not.
If the goods are non-stackable, ALL pieces have to be included in dimensions.
Must be false for ULD shipments.
Default true

dualUseGoods.description:
Dual-use goods are goods that can be used for both civilian and military applications and subject to regulation
Only non-dual-use goods are allowed (must be false).

totalActualWeight.description: Details on the total weight of goods for the requested quote.

totalVolume.description: Details on the total volume of goods for the requested quote.

totalNumberOfPieces.description: Amount of goods for the requested quote.

dimensions.description:
List of detailed dimensions of the loose shipment for the requested quote.
Mandatory if TotalActualWeight exceeds 1 tonne or TotalVolume exceeds 6 cubic meters.

specialHandlingCodes.description: List of special handling codes for the requested quote.

ulds.description: List of details of the containerized (ULD) shipment.

contactEmails.description: Contactdetails (list of emails) for the requested quote.

localScheduledArrivalDateAndTime.description: Local scheduled time of departure of a flight.

localScheduledDepartureDateAndTime.description: Local scheduled time of arrival of a flight.

utcScheduledArrivalDateAndTime.description: UTC scheduled time of departure of a flight.

utcScheduledDepartureDateAndTime.description: UTC scheduled time of arrival of a flight.

onload.description: Onload station (IATA code) for this route.

offload.description: Offload station (IATA code) for this route.

breakEven.description: Indicator for weightbreak processing. If false: then the normal weight breaks are used. If not, then the adjusted weight breaks apply.

weightBreaks.description: List of weightbreaks. These are the weight ranges on which a particular unit price applies.

Models.Dto.Rates.BulkRateDetail.description: The bulk rate detail for the rate definition.

iataNumber.description: Identifier of the party in the International Air Transport Association.

flightDateFrom.description:
Any valid flight date format 'yyyy-MM-dd'. If not provided, value will default to today's date.
Cannot be set further than 30 days in the future.

flightDateTo.description:
Any valid flight date format 'yyyy-MM-dd'. If not provided, value will default to (flightDateFrom + 14 days).
Must be a later date than flightDateFrom, cannot be set further than 30 days in the future.

airportOfOrigin.description: Can be null or any valid airport code. In IATA format.

airportOfDestination.description: Can be null or any valid airport code. In IATA format.

rateCode.description:
The indication whether the contractual rate is based on Soft Block (SB), Hard Block (HB) or Price Agreement (PA).
Can be null, "HB" or "SB" or "PA".

commodityForRating.description: To apply a specific commodity-rate for this shipment.

rateSequenceNumber.description: This is the rate sequence identifier that was assigned by .

origin.description: The origin airport (IATA code) for which this rate applies.

destination.description: The destination airport (IATA code) for which this rate applies.

rateCode.description: The rateCode applied for this rate.

startDate.description: The starting date from which this rate is valid.

endDate.description:
The expiry date until which this rate is valid.
If null, the rate's validity is indefinite.

currencyCode.description: ISO Currency Code; Coded representation of a currency approved by ISO.

weightUnit.description: Code identifying the unit of weight used in this rate.

allIn.description: Indicates if all surcharges are included or not.

uldContour.description: The shape/outline of a ULD (unit Load device)

pivotWeight.description: If the weight inside a container exceeds this amount of kgs, surcharges can be applied.

overPivotRate.description: This is the rate per kg surcharge.

outsideBulkRate.description: Extra charge for package outside the ULD container.

Models.Dto.Rates.UldDetails.description:
Information on the weight brakes of the rate for containerized package (empty if bulk rate).
Detail of the UL rate (empty if bulk rate)

weightBreak.description: A weight range on which a particular unit price applies.

pivotWeight.description: Pivot weight is an alternate weightbreak maximum that applies when the breakeven rule is set to true for that particular weightbreak.
